name: webcrypto-core
description: Common layer to be used by crypto libraries based on WebCrypto API for input validation.

scripts.build:dist: npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es2015
scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.predev: if [ ! -f coverage/index.html ]; then mkdir coverage; cp .waiting.html coverage/index.html; fi

banner: // Copyright (c) 2017, Peculiar Ventures, All rights reserved.
